EmailTemplate.name: NMD Outreach 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for reaching out to WeWork!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Salutation_Name__c},
Thanks for your interest in WeWork! We're thrilled you're thinking of joining our community.
I'm here to provide more information on our beautiful workspaces, learn more about your specific business needs, and schedule a tour at your preferred location(s).
Just reply directly to this email or give me a call at {!Lead.Location_Phone_Number__c} with any questions you might have.
Thanks, and talk soon!
{!User.Name} {!Lead.Location_Phone_Number__c} wework.com
